twoSetSkill.name: Shakespeare's Globe 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Boosts Fire DMG by 20.0%. Landing an Ultimate within 4s after its cast raises Alignment by 1 (4 levels in total: Jove/Venus/Luna/Sol). Alignment drops by 1 every 10s and can be refreshed at level 4. Alignment 4 (Sol) makes enemies take 20.0% bonus Fire DMG from host (independent effect).

threeSetSkill.name: King's Men 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Boosts Ultimate's Total DMG by 30.0%. Raising or refreshing Alignment restores 30.0 HP. Durandal equip bonus: Ultimates deal 15.0% bonus Total DMG. Landing a Throw or QTE raises Alignment by 1.
